channel.title: Note Page Bingo Wanted - Level 47
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Note Page Bingo Wanted - Level 47"

item.title: Re: Note Page Bingo Wanted - Level 47
item.content:encoded: Thanks, and I just NP Bingo'd you too.

item.title: Re: Note Page Bingo Wanted - Level 47
item.content:encoded: Done. You should be successfully bingoed with a note page.

item.title: Re: Note Page Bingo Wanted - Level 47
item.content:encoded: Okay. I need to get a spy into your Village first, so I'll post back here when I succeed.

item.title: Re: Note Page Bingo Wanted - Level 47
item.content:encoded:
I don't have any Note Pages on me. If you do NP bingo me, I'll run some missions at the next dayroll to try to get some. Hopefully it won't take me longer than a single day.

Oh and I had someone attempt to bingo me, but failed. I assume it was because of this line from the Note Page page:
"The Note Page doesn't work if the combined Peacetime Bonuses of the Attacker's and Defender's Villages are +4 or greater."

item.title: Re: Note Page Bingo Wanted - Level 47
item.content:encoded: Uhm, I would be happy to Bingo you. However, is it possible for you to return the favor? I'm level 51 in the Volcano Village.

item.title: Re: Note Page Bingo Wanted - Level 47
item.content:encoded: Sigh, I'm still looking for someone to NP bingo me. As of now, I'm level 50, same village.

item.title: Note Page Bingo Wanted - Level 47
item.content:encoded: If anyone can, I'm still looking for someone to Note-Page bingo me. As of this post, I'm level 47, Aequitas of Tardis Village. I'm currently not bingo'd for those trying to get 200 style points.
